channel.title: Need Help! Tele out of combat
channel.description: in pvp on atomic 562 players can tele once dead and go to home the other player will not get the drop and the one who teled will keep their stuff. idk how to fix it. hopefully someone here can! thanks- nardo

item.title: Need Help! Tele out of combat
item.dc:creator: @Owned_Pl0xs Owned_Pl0xs
item.description:
@Owned_Pl0xs wrote:

Loop through the players inventory and delete it upon death.

As for removing equipment, there is a packet ( Don’t know it for 562.)

Find it in the client, write a server sided method for it. Use it to remove the equipment into your inventory and then do the same thing. Then you need to use the packet for creating ground items (use the one in your drop item if you have that working.)

Btw, I don’t think you need to use the remove equipment method, you can just probably loop through equipment too and delete it and then just use the drop method to make the equipment appear on the ground.

Read full topic
item.source: Need Help! Tele out of combat
